Title: 081: Data Visualization & How to Freelance Your Passion
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Data Visualisation Designer, Nadieh Bremer. You will hear about the relationship between algorithm and visualization, learn the top data visualization tips, and ways of creating presentable visualizations and how to present them.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/81
